messages.message:
Has anyone else seen the vscode `jedi-language-server.py` taking 100% cpu even after quitting vscode? This has happened to me multiple times this week even after restarting the computer :disappointed:. Seems to happen kind of randomly (rolling the dice every time I quit vscode :joy: )
```efriis           47480 101.7  0.9  6806220 302140   ??  R     4:21PM  50:51.39 /Users/efriis/instabase/venv3/bin/python3.7 /Users/efriis/.vscode/extensions/ms-python.python-2021.3.680753044/pythonFiles/run-jedi-language-server.py```
pylance is the new python lang server for vscode. maybe you could give that a try?
